My ApplicationCaculadoraNotas Average Calculator (7 MATERIALS)button6 Start About Calculate Your Average Note 1 Note 2 Note 3 Result Total Average Save Notes Informat Name Subject 1 Name Subject 2 Name Subject 3 Name Subject 4 Name Subject 5 Name Subject 6 Name Subject 7
Your Performance is Rated as If your note is Less than 1 = Poor Performance May to 1 and Less than 2 = Insufficient Performance Greater than 2 and less than 3 = Low Performance Greater than 3 and Less than 3.5 = Good Performance Greater than 3.5 and less than 4.5 = Very Good Performance Greater than 4.5 and less than 5.0 = Excellent Performance The important thing is not what you know, but how fast you learn
